name: Onechanbara: Bikini Zombie Slayers
description:
Onechanbara: Bikini Zombie Slayers is the ultimate evolution of the
blood-splattering samurai action game. This hack-and-slash thriller
filled with skimpy outfits offers a distinctive combat system with a
variety of combos, character-unique moves and upgrades that make slicing
through blood and gore all the more entertaining.
